001package com.example.geometry;
002
003/**
004 * An immutable axis-aligned rectangle defined by width and height.
005 *
006 * <p>Demonstrates another implementation of the {@link Shape} API.</p>
007 *
008 * @author ChatGPT
009 * @since 1.0
010 */
011public final class Rectangle implements Shape {
012    private final double width;
013    private final double height;
014
015    /**
016     * Creates a rectangle.
017     *
018     * @param width  the width (must be {@code >= 0})
019     * @param height the height (must be {@code >= 0})
020     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if any dimension is negative
021     */
022    public Rectangle(double width, double height) {
023        if (width < 0 || height < 0) {
024            throw new IllegalArgumentException("width/height must be >= 0");
025        }
026        this.width = width;
027        this.height = height;
028    }
029
030    /**
031     * Returns the width of this rectangle.
032     *
033     * @return the width (non-negative)
034     */
035    public double width() {
036        return width;
037    }
038
039    /**
040     * Returns the height of this rectangle.
041     *
042     * @return the height (non-negative)
043     */
044    public double height() {
045        return height;
046    }
047
048    @Override
049    public double area() {
050        return width * height;
051    }
052
053    @Override
054    public double perimeter() {
055        return 2 * (width + height);
056    }
057
058    @Override
059    public String describe() {
060        return "Rectangle[w=" + width + ", h=" + height + "]";
061    }
062}
